issue.title: [Java] Correctly set "lastSet" for variable vectors in JsonReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Arrow Java JsonFileReader does not correctly set "lastSet" in VariableWidthVectors which makes reading inner vectors overly complicated.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1619?focusedCommentId=16185989) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1140
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1140>
